Experiment Method.Assay Method: In vitro kinase assay and pull-down experiments

Material used.Description: Cells were transfected with wild-type or mutant LRRK2 protein.

Readout description.Result Description: Immunoblot showed reduced phosphorylation at serine 1441 (R variant)
Immunoblot showed reduced phosphorylation at serine 2019 (G variant)
Immunoblot showed reduced phosphorylation at serine 2020 (I variant)

Biological replicates.Description: Data averaged from three independent cell populations.

Technical replicates.Technical replicates: Each experiment was repeated with identical controls.
Technical replicates.Description: All immunoblot experiments were performed in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 protein served as the positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Non-target constructs were used to establish baseline phosphorylation levels.

Validation controls P/LP.Validation controls P/LP: Two LP constructs were validated for proper LRRK2 kinase activity.

Validation controls B/LB.Validation controls B/LB: One LB construct was used to confirm baseline Akt1 phosphorylation levels.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-tailed t-test (unpaired) for comparing phosphorylation ratios.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Phosphorylated Akt1 protein levels greater than 20% in immunoblot.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Phosphorylated Akt1 protein levels less than 5% in immunoblot.
